sub_title: Senior Program Manager at Human Security Collective
summary:
I am an international consultant/advisor with an educational background and experience in agricultural economy and social sciences. My extensive experience is grounded in rural development and action-oriented research in which I demonstrate a deep understanding of the interaction between local and global socio-economic challenges. I have unique skills to facilitate multi-actors dialogue for sustainable conflict resolution over resource use. While aiming for a holistic approach towards Climate Smart Agriculture / Pastoralism, my focus is on the improvement of people’s livelihoods in highly dynamic regional and global contexts where people need to develop the structures and systems to function best.  

Areas of expertise: Pastoralist livelihoods analysis / improvement; Sustainable Agriculture / Pastoralism value chain development and food security, Process/Result-oriented program formulation, review and evaluation; Partnership development and resource mobilization; Action-oriented research and Capacity building; Development and PVE.
